title: The Road to Bedlam
description: Niall Petersen's whole life has been turned on its head by the revelation that he can do magic. Now he has just received the news no parent wants to hear. "There's been an accident. It's your daughter".Learning to cope with the loss of a child is only the beginning of the new challenges facing Niall Petersen. author: Mike Shevdon
